translations.translation: And drink over it scalding water,
and thereupon you shall drink boiling water,
and on top of this you will drink boiling water
And upon it, you will drink the hot boiling water.
And drink the Hamim on top of it."
Then drink over it of boiling water;
and drink on top of that boiling water
And thereon ye will drink of boiling water,
and shall drink boiling water on top of that.
And shall be drinkers thereon of boiling water.
and drink boiling water on top of it,
And drink Boiling Water on top of it:
And drink boiling water on top of it,
and drink boiling water on top of that,
Will be drinking on top of it boiling water.
And drinking on top of it from scalding water
[56:54] and drink on top of that, the consumed Zaqqūm, boiling water,
(And thereon) and upon eating from the Zaqqum (ye will drink of boiling water,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَشَارِبُونَ عَلَيْهِ } أي: على الزقوم { مِنَ ٱلْحَمِيمِ } [الواقعة: 54] لشدة الحرقة وغلبة العطش، وبالجملة: { فَشَارِبُونَ } من الحميم { شُرْبَ ٱلْهِيمِ } [الواقعة: 55] مثل شرب الإبل، الذي له داء الهيام، وهو مرض من الإبل شبيه باستسقاء الإنسان
